trans-unit.source: "We have endured lifetimes of war and carved our way to peace by blade and conquest. Now, united at last under Kyodai's guidance, we lay down our weapons and open our minds."\n—Aoha, general of the First Emperor
trans-unit.target: 「我辈一生饱受战事之苦，凭手中刀剑与无畏征伐方才辟出和平大道。如今得香醍引领，吾人甘愿团结一心，抛却手中武器，放开脑中思绪。」 ～始帝将军青叶

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 4 or greater.
II — Each player gains control of all permanents they own.

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

trans-unit.resname: NEO·38 | Spirited Companion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She formed a friendship with several playful spirits, and soon "the pack" was known as the source of much mischief in Eiganjo.
trans-unit.target: 她与几个淘气神灵结下友谊，很快这一「小团体」就成为永岩城内诸多恶戏的根源。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·39 | Sunblade Samurai | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunblade Samurai
trans-unit.target: 阳刃武士

trans-unit.resname: NEO·39 | Sunblade Samurai | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nChannel — {2}, Discard CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 魂力～{2}，弃掉CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的平原牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·40 | Touch the Spirit Realm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Touch the Spirit Realm
trans-unit.target: 亲触灵界

trans-unit.resname: NEO·40 | Touch the Spirit Realm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile up to one target artifact or creature until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.\nChannel — {1}{W}, Discard CARDNAME: Exile target artifact or creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐至多一个目标神器或生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。 魂力～{1}{W}，弃掉CARDNAME：放逐目标神器或生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·41 | Wanderer's Intervention | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wanderer's Intervention
trans-unit.target: 飘萍干预

trans-unit.resname: NEO·41 | Wanderer's Intervention | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·41 | Wanderer's Intervention | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Just as Jin-Gitaxias's victory seemed certain, the Wanderer appeared, her blade already in motion. One mighty slash was enough to take the praetor out of the fight.
trans-unit.target: 金吉塔厦自认大局底定时，飘萍突然现身，手中长剑已扬。只见亮光闪过，她的一记重斩就足以击碎魔判官的所有胜算。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Wandering Emperor
trans-unit.target: 飘萍皇

trans-unit.resname: NEO·42 | The Wandering Emperor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flash
As long as CARDNAME entered the battlefield this turn, you may activate her loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains first strike until end of turn.
[−1]: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance.
[−2]: Exile target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 只要CARDNAME是于本回合进战场，你便可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下起动她的忠诚异能。 +1：在至多一个目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得先攻异能直到回合结束。 −1：派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的武士衍生生物。 −2：放逐目标已横置的生物。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·43 | When We Were Young | Card Name
trans-unit.source: When We Were Young
trans-unit.target: 遥想年少

trans-unit.resname: NEO·43 | When We Were Young | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an artifact and an enchantment, those creatures also gain lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 至多两个目标生物各得+2/+2直到回合结束。如果你同时操控神器和结界，则这些生物再获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·43 | When We Were Young | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Since Imperial custom strictly forbade the Emperor to reveal her name—even to Kaito, her closest childhood friend—she had to suffer him calling her "your emperorness" for much of their shared youth.
trans-unit.target: 皇室严禁今上向任何人透露自己姓名～就连她的青梅竹马魁渡也不例外。因此在共度的大半年少岁月中，她只得一直忍受对方称呼自己「皇上」。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Acquisition Octopus
trans-unit.target: 窃物八爪械

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.\nReconfigure {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。 重配{2}（{2}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上；或从生物上卸装。重配的时机视同法术。它于贴附期间不是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: NEO·44 | Acquisition Octopus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You can never have too many arms.
trans-unit.target: 再多手都不嫌多。

trans-unit.target: 锚定实界

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.\nSearch your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If it has mana value less than the sacrificed permanent's mana value, scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 从你牌库中搜寻一张武具或载具牌，将该牌放进战场，然后洗牌。如果该牌的法术力值小于所牺牲之永久物，则占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·45 | Anchor to Reality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Wanderer sighed in relief as the Reality Chip tethered her wayward spark to Kamigawa.
trans-unit.target: 飘萍眼见实界晶片将其难控火花栓定神河之后，反而长舒一口气。

Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

trans-unit.target: 结附于神器或生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，在所结附的永久物上放置X个+1/+1指示物。 只要所结附的永久物是生物，它的基础力量与防御力便为1/1。

trans-unit.source: Behold the Unspeakable
trans-unit.target: 亲见忌话图

trans-unit.resname: NEO·48 | Behold the Unspeakable | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Creatures you don't control get -2/-0 until your next turn.
II — If you have one or fewer cards in hand, draw four cards. Otherwise, scry 2, then draw two cards.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 不由你操控的生物得-2/-0直到你的下一个回合。 II — 如果你的手牌为一张或更少，则抓四张牌。若否，则占卜2，然后抓两张牌。 III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 你每有一张手牌，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·48 | Vision of the Unspeakable | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even as her students' minds succumbed to madness, Azami's obsession with the kami of forbidden knowledge only grew.
trans-unit.target: 纵使学院门生难承重压失智发狂，但蓟夫人对禁识神痴迷之情却只增不减。

trans-unit.target: 忍术{1}{U}（{1}{U}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。） 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以将一张法术力值等于或小于该伤害的神器牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·50 | Discover the Impossible | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Discover the Impossible
trans-unit.target: 探索未然

trans-unit.resname: NEO·50 | Discover the Impossible | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library. Exile one of them face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if it's an instant spell with mana value 2 or less. If you don't, put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。牌面朝下地放逐其中一张，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。如果所放逐之牌是法术力值等于或小于2的瞬间咒语，则你可以施放它，且不需支付其法术力费用。如果你未如此作，则将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·51 | Disruption Protocol | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let's just turn that off, shall we?"
trans-unit.target: 「就把它关掉吧，如何？」

trans-unit.resname: NEO·52 | Essence Capture | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Futurists regard the tradition of kami-bonding as anachronistic and inefficient, striving constantly to surpass spiritual power with technology.
trans-unit.target: 赛博派觉得「结神缘」这一传统既过时效果又不彰，故而致力发展科技，希冀有朝一日以此超越灵力。

trans-unit.target: 赛博派特务

trans-unit.resname: NEO·53 | Futurist Operative | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME已横置，它便是基础力量与防御力为1/1的人类／市民，且不能被阻挡。 {2}{U}：重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·53 | Futurist Operative | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Imperials can't arrest you for illegal tech if you never even existed."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你未曾存在，皇室当然就没法以滥用技术罪名来拘捕你。」

trans-unit.target: 搭载3（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于3的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: NEO·54 | Futurist Sentinel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I folded a model in paper first to test the relative tensile strength of the plates."\n—Katsumasa, the Animator

I — Return up to one target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: "Pierce the heart and pierce the head, even the mightiest fall down dead."

trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个其他有饰装的生物，CARDNAME便得+2/+0。（武具，指示物，以及由你操控的灵气均为饰装。）

trans-unit.resname: NEO·170 | Upriser Renegade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My streets, my rules. You picked the wrong neighborhood for a fight."
trans-unit.target: 「我的地盘，由我作主。你打架选错地方了。」

trans-unit.resname: NEO·171 | Voltage Surge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an artifact.\nCARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell's additional cost was paid, CARDNAME deals 4 damage instead.

trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — You may play an additional land this turn.
II — You gain 3 life.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 本回合中，你可以额外使用一个地。 II — 你获得3点生命。 III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, you gain 4 life.

trans-unit.resname: NEO·176 | Boon of Boseiju | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She closed her eyes and remembered the smell of the leaves of Jukai Forest. When she opened them, the buildings of Towashi had grown small.

trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 从你牌库中搜寻至多两张基本的树林牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后洗牌。 II — 将至多一张目标地牌从你坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。 III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target card other than a basic land card from an opponent's graveyard. Whenever equipped creature dies, exile it.

trans-unit.target: 系命 你施放的结界咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·510 | Jukai Naturalist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He had heard rumors of the cities—the constant noise, the stagnant air, the tainted water—and he had no wish to learn if they were true.
trans-unit.target: 城市风言虽也传入其耳～噪声不绝、空气脏浊、水源遭染～但他却无意探究其真假。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·512 | Secluded Courtyard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or activate an ability of a creature source of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放该类别的生物咒语，或是起动为该类别之生物或生物牌的异能。

trans-unit.resname: NEO·513 | Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant
trans-unit.target: 进展暴君金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: NEO·513 | Jin-Gitaxias, Progress Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)\nWhenever an opponent casts an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell, counter that spell. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器，瞬间或法术咒语时，复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。此异能每回合只会触发一次。 每当任一对手施放神器，瞬间或法术咒语时，反击该咒语。此异能每回合只会触发一次。
